myfuel.Request

Class FuelOrderRequest

  • java.lang.Object
    • myfuel.Request.Request
      • myfuel.Request.FuelOrderRequest
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    java.io.Serializable

    public class FuelOrderRequest
extends Request
    Fuel Request class, contains all the request details that will be send to the server.
    Author:
    Maor
    See Also:
    Serialized Form

    • Constructor Detail

      • FuelOrderRequest

        public FuelOrderRequest(RequestEnum type,
                        int FuelID,
                        int customerID)
        Create new get info request (Get all details from the Database).
        Parameters:
        type - - in this case, type will be select query.
        FuelID - - the FuelID number (for checking available promotion).
        customerID - - get all home fuel orders for this specific customer.

      • FuelOrderRequest

        public FuelOrderRequest(RequestEnum type,
                        Purchase pur,
                        HomeOrder order)
        Create new insert purchase request (insert new purchase to the DB)
        Parameters:
        type - - In this case , type will be insert query.
        pur - - The purchase details object.
        order - - Home order details object (in case this purchase is home order , need to insert the details into the home order table).
